type.description: The type of this property MUST be 'coordinates'.

x.description: A positive number representing the x coordinate of the construct visualized relative to the upper-left (origin - O) corner of the canvas.

y.description: A positive number representing the y coordinate of the construct visualized relative to the upper-left (origin - O) corner of the canvas.

width.description: A positive number representing the width of the construct visualized.

height.description: A positive number representing the height of the construct visualized.
